title: Crespelle con funghi (Italian crepes with mushrooms)
ingredients: ['For the bechamel', '50g butter', '50g plain flour', '500ml milk', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'For the crespelle', '2 eggs', '20g butter, melted', '300ml warm milk', '125g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', 'For the stuffing', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, gently crushed', '1 small bunch parsley, chopped, stalks and leaves separated', '400g mushrooms, sliced', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
